>>-----Original M=
essage-----
>>From: Rogers, Jason [mailto:jrogers@...]

>>=

>>
>>Instead of using literals in the program (\n \r), use the
>>System.ge=
tProperty("line.separator") and test against that if you need
>>to test it.=
  Using this and others in the code (i.e.
>>getProperty("file.separator") o=
r File.SEPARATOR, etc.) will greatly
>>reduce the need to "port" to other O=
S's.
>>
>>-jason
